metadata.title: HashiCorp Terraform Associate TA-003 Practice Questions

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within Understand Infrastructure as Code Concepts (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Infrastructure as Code Definition is a key concept in Understand Infrastructure as Code Concepts. This domain covers topics essential for the HashiCorp Terraform Associate exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with describe advantages of iac patterns. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any understand infrastructure as code concepts task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in Understand Infrastructure as Code Concepts is most closely related to explain what iac is?
options: Understand Infrastructure as Code Concepts governance and oversight
Understand Infrastructure as Code Concepts implementation and operations
Understand Infrastructure as Code Concepts assessment and testing
Understand Infrastructure as Code Concepts risk management
questions.explanation: Explain what IaC is falls under the implementation and operations aspect of Understand Infrastructure as Code Concepts.
